name: Kingdom Game 4.0
description: Kingdom game 4.0 is empowered NFT Streaming combines with NFT Market and Game blockchain service. With a combination of blockchain-based and revolutionary technology, we are creating a new platform where there is an inseparable connection between game developers, gamers, and networks of distribution systems. With the mission of bringing true value to players, preserving in-game assets for gamers, bringing practical benefits to agents and that is also the reason why Kingdom game 4.0 was born.
